title.text: A STOCHASTIC APPROACH TO SENTENCE PARSING

entities.text: A STOCHASTIC APPROACH TO SENTENCE PARSING

abstractContent.text: A description will be given of a procedure to asslgn the most likely probabilitles to each of the rules of a given context-free grammar.
The grammar developed by S. Kuno at Harvard University was picked as the basis and was successfully augmented with rule probabilities.
A brief exposition of the method with some preliminary results, whenused as a device for disamblguatingparsing English texts picked from natural corpus, will be given.
